text: Hi! Would anyone be interested in showing me how to sync a drop down select field between HubSpot and Microsoft Dynamics CRM using ops hub? Will pay for your time :relaxed: DM me if interested with availability & $

Hello! I am being shown a banner in my developer account that my Vidyard videos were copied to HubSpot video 2.0.
The problem I'm facing currently is that we built several custom modules for a client using the Vidyard API to create some features (autoplay, buttons to certains points in the video, things like that) and those no longer work. Is there a HubSpot API that might be able to do those same things?

So in my project I have Custom objects called Resources, each time a contact accesses one of these resources I would like to log that somehow any suggestions how to do this? a note maybe on the resource associated with the contact?
First thought would be the timeline event API or behavioral events API, depending on your use-case (analytics/CRM documentation vs list segmentation or other marketing automation)
Hi everyone! how can I get note comment from api
